synopsis.text: Tokyo's Marehoshi Academy, nestled at the base of Mount Takao, is the setting for this anime adaptation of the "Re:Stage!" franchise. New student Mana Shikimiya, a talented singer and dancer, transfers to the school with hopes of living an ordinary life, having abandoned her dreams of joining an idol group. However, her path crosses with the school's struggling idol club, and she is reminded of her love for singing and dancing when she meets club member Sayu. Together, they strive to save the club from disbandment and aim to compete in the prestigious "Prism Stage," a national secondary school idol competition. Joined by new friends, Mana reignites her passion for stardom and embarks on a journey to become the top idol. This multimedia project also includes a mobile game, novel, and music singles, providing a rich and immersive experience for fans of the genre.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
